name: Scape the room 1'
description:
Submission for One Minute Jam 2021

Escape the Room before the mutant attackers break into it. Resolve 3 puzzles in under 60 seconds.

Controls: 

  • Camera movement: Mouse
  • Player movement: Cursors or WASD

The source code is available on GitHub

Third party assets used:

  • Player movement: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/character-movement-fundament...
  • Asteroids: 
    • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/asteroids-pack-84988 
    • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/level-design/asteroid-field-creator-...
  • Skybox: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/spaceskies-free-...
  • Environment assets: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/sci-fi/sci-fi-facility-116...
  • Particles: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/spells/52-special-effects-pa...
  • Background music: 
    • https://opengameart.org/content/space-scifi-ambient 
    • https://opengameart.org/content/sci-fi-theme
  • Sound FX: 
    • https://opengameart.org/content/jump-and-run-and-stand
    • https://opengameart.org/content/42-snow-and-gravel-footsteps
    • https://opengameart.org/content/zombie-spider-and-monster
    • https://opengameart.org/content/q009s-weapon-sounds
    • https://opengameart.org/content/airvent-loop
    • https://opengameart.org/content/metal-sounds
    • https://opengameart.org/content/100-cc0-sfx-2
    • https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone
  • Character and animations: https://www.mixamo.com/
